name: VR 𝓐 𝖗𝖌𝖔𝖓 𝕯𝖗𝖆𝖌𝖔𝖓 🐉🔮
description: VR 𝓐 𝖗𝖌𝖔𝖓 𝕯𝖗𝖆𝖌𝖔𝖓 🐉 - I created this (unfinished) fantasy argon dragon in Virtual Reality. . . 🔮 Argon is a noble gas, and is an element which glows purple 💜 when excited by a high voltage ⚡ electric field, which this dragon emits. 🐲 . . I made this in VR in Google Tiltbrush back in 2016 with an HTC Vive and an Asus ROG rig w/ a GTX 1070.
